metadata.dc:author: Grant, C
Arrieta, F J
Ruiz-Barnés, J
Carrasco, M
Campos, J M
Herrera Pombo, J L
metadata.dc:description: We here present the case of a patient who starts with a progressive vision loss, observing in the radiologic exam herniation of optic chiasma in a primary empty sella turcica. Based on this case, we have performed a review of this clinical picture and point out the most important aspects in the literature.
metadata.dc:title: Silla turca vacía con herniación intraselar del quiasma óptico.
[Empty sella turcica with intrasellar herniation of the optic chiasm].
